entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to rain showers in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
